subject: Doping (Sports)
Decisions and Verdicts
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Spain’s Supreme Court has ruled that Roberto Heras must be reinstated as the winner of the 2005 Spanish Vuelta after it upheld a lower court’s decision to clear him of a doping ban that had stripped him of the title.
snippet: Spain’s Supreme Court has ruled that Roberto Heras must be reinstated as the winner of the 2005 Spanish Vuelta after it upheld a lower court’s decision to clear him of a doping ban that had stripped him of the title.
